sn34.35-40:1.3: samadhismim arammanakusalo hoti, na samadhismim kallitakusalo …
sn34.35-40:1.4: neva samadhismim kallitakusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim arammanakusalo …
sn34.35-40:1.5: samadhismim kallitakusalo ca hoti, samadhismim arammanakusalo ca.
sn34.35-40:1.9: (Purimamulakani viya yava cattalisama kallitamulakasappayakarisutta cha suttani puretabbani.)
